description: This file defines a performance evaluation script that runs an AI agent with a specific model and system message, then measures its performance using the PerformanceEval class.

classes.name: PerformanceEval
classes.description: Class used to evaluate the performance of a function over multiple iterations.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Creates an AI agent with a specified model and system message, runs it with a prompt, prints the response content, and returns the response.
